summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019, including count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms. It details inmate counts by housing unit and assignments, including specific assignments for suicide observation and attorney visits. The documents appear to be routine prison operational records from the day.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative counts of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including out-counts and specific assignments for suicide observation and attorney visits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The documents are from August 9, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Inmate rosters show specific assignments, including several inmates assigned to 'PS PM SUICIDE OR' (Presumably Suicide Observation).
An attorney visit roster lists three inmates with registration numbers, one of which (91126-053) is assigned to a specific location (I04-930U).
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts, locations, and movements.
Multiple out-count forms were prepared, indicating inmates were to be counted outside their housing units for various reasons.
